verbs.description: [V: aubameyang] [ARG1: ozil star] as arsenal make it perfect 10 pierre - emerick aubameyang and mesut ozil stole the show as arsenal swept to their 10th successive win with a dominant 3 - 1 victory against leicester on monday portugal leicester rob ozil arsenal rob holding kasper schmeichel lisbon granit xhaka harry maguire europa league mesut gabon arsene wenger leno gunners unai emery hector bellerin claude puel arsène wenger mesut özil aubameyang wilfried ndidi arsenal fc crystal palace mesut ozil emirates stadium
